thread.title: Man Utd news: Antoine Griezmann will watch PSG v Barcelona rather than go out for Valentine's Day with his wife | Metro News
thread.title_full: Man Utd news: Antoine Griezmann will watch PSG v Barcelona rather than go out for Valentine's Day with his wife | Metro News

author: George Bellshaw For Metro.Co.Uk
title: Man Utd news: Antoine Griezmann will watch PSG v Barcelona rather than go out for Valentine's Day with his wife | Metro News
text:
Search Metro Follow us Antoine Griezmann will watch PSG v Barcelona rather than go out for Valentine’s Day with his wife George Bellshaw for Metro.co.uk Tuesday 14 Feb 2017 5:55 pm Griezmann has put his Valentine’s Day romance aside (Picture: Getty) 
Antoine Griezmann has revealed he’ll be shunning his wife tonight in order to watch Paris Saint-Germain against Barcelona. ‘How can Gibbs be captain?!’ Man Utd legend Roy Keane TEARS into Arsenal flops 
The Atletico Madrid star was asked about his Valentine’s Day plans and whether he would be watching the colossal Champions League tie between two of Europe’s biggest clubs and he admitted his wife would be drawing the short straw on the most romantic day of the year. 
‘I’ll be watching PSG v Barca,’ he told RMC. 
‘It’s a shame for my wife who would have certainly preferred to go to a restaurant.’
